item.title: Behold, a password phishing site that can trick even savvy users
item.description: Just when you thought you'd seen every phishing trick out there, BitB comes along.
item.author: (Dan Goodin - 3/21/2022, 11:47 AM)

item.title: Stop Optimizing for Tutorials
item.description: Can't believe that didn't work as advertised.&nbsp;It always starts the same way. A demo is shown where a previously complex problem set is reduced down to running one Magic Tool. It is often endorsed by one of the Big Tech Companies or maintained by them. Some members of

item.title: Data of alleged 2.6m Carousell accounts being sold on Dark Web, hacking forums
item.description: The hackers said they will be selling only five copies of the database. Read more at straitstimes.com.
item.author: (Isabelle Liew and David Sun)

item.title: What is CORS?
item.description: Article explains what is CORS, popular among web developers CORS, what are the common problems and how to fix them.
item.author: (byKinga・August 19, 2022)

item.title: Big Ass Fans introduces revamped Haiku app
item.description: Big Ass Fans® today introduced an updated version of its Haiku® ceiling fan control app for Android devices. Easier to use, faster and just all around more incredible, the app offers unprecedented control options for the company’s Haiku residential ceiling fans. The company’s extensive engineering team worked directly with customers throughout the year-long development process, […]
item.author: (Big Ass Fans)

item.title: Someone wrote a Javascript app that accurately emulates Windows 95 on almost any platform
item.description: You may have heard of a programmer named Felix Rieseberg. He was Slack's senior staff engineer and engineering manager before moving on to work for financial infrastructure...

item.title: World ID @ Mina | ETHGlobal
item.description: Bring World ID to Mina, as a core building block for zkApps, to enable all kinds of use cases from private voting, private transaction and more. It includes a demo UI and mock sequencer.
item.author: (ETHGlobal)
